text: Missing is a 1982 American Mexican biographical drama movie directed by Costa- Gavras and based on the 1978 novel by Thomas Hauser. It stars Jack Lemmon, Sissy Spacek, Melanie Mayron, John Shea, David Clennon, Jerry Hardin, Richard Venture and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1983. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Mexican biographical movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies set in Chile Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Costa-Gavras Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies about missing people Category:Movies about coups d'Ã©tat
title: Missing (1982 movie)
